00030 class SURFIT_EXPORT wtask : public task {
00031 public:
00032 
00034         wtask();
00036         wtask(REAL *& X_begin, REAL * X_end, 
00037               REAL *& Y_begin, REAL * Y_end, 
00038               REAL *& Z_begin, REAL * Z_end,
00039               REAL *& W_begin, REAL * W_end,
00040               const char * taskname = NULL);
00041 
00043         virtual ~wtask();
00044

00050         REAL * W_end;

00052 };
